summary: Play as Bam Bam from the Flinstones!
descriptionHtml:
You are a child with a giant\'s club. Anyone who knows the Flinstones knows Bam Bam, and I thought I\'d goof around and make him. 

He is level 1, in Helgen Keep still. He has a Giant Club, but I wouldn\'t suggest using a different weapon or you\'ll lose it forever. Or, you could just use the un-playable weapons mod and it should appear in your inventory.

The list of bugs with the save are these:
Equipped apparel will not show up, but you will receive all effects normally.
You cannot un-equip the Giant Club or it will disappear forever.
When you load the save, it may give you a nonexistent content error, just click yes and load it anyways.

This is just a silly little save to play around with.
author: debugman18
